title: 6.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
The following lists represent the names of the top 10 most populous nations in 2021 and their respective populations.

Create a DataFrame from the above data with columns Country and Population. Set Country as the index of the DataFrame. Display the first 5 rows of the DataFrame and the details of the DataFrame using the appropriate function.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
